    public class MCFStepView
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    Created by lucascabrales on 12/26/17.

    Holds the definition for the MCFStepView.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(boolean enable)
        Removes the current selection of the MCFStepView. Also, enables or disables it. This can be used to deselect a dependent MCFStep if its parent has been selected (changed data dependency).
        Parameters:
        enable - Whether to enable the MCFStepView.

      • deselect

        public void deselect()
        Removes the current selection of the MCFStepView and disables it.
